segments.text: Over here is our gym . We have all the latest equipment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I haven't used exercising equipment before . Can you tell us some more details ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . We have here the race apparatus , stationary bike , muscle builder set , chest expander , bar bell , dumb bell and so on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Working in the gym is a very good way for losing weight . What else do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here's the swimming pool . It's open from 10 a . m . to 11 p . m . There are also massage rooms here .
segments.speaker: S1
